services.label: What We Do
services.title: Our Services

staffAug.title: Staff Augmentation
staffAug.description: Embed our engineers directly into your team. Scale up or down as needed.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End
endToEnd.description: We own the project from discovery to deployment. You stay focused on your business.

bot.title: Build-Operate-Transfer
bot.description: We build it, run it until it's stable, then transfer ownership to your team.

timeMaterial.title: Time & Material
timeMaterial.description: Flexible scope, pay for actual work. Best for evolving requirements.

fixedBid.title: Fixed Bid
fixedBid.description: Defined scope, agreed price. Best for well-specified projects.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Engineering teams
about.subtitle: you can rely on
about.description: We're a team of engineers who've built and scaled products at startups and enterprises alike. We partner with companies to solve hard technical problems — from AI systems that actually work in production to platforms that scale with your ambition.

security.label: Security & Compliance
security.title: Built on trust
security.description: Security isn't an afterthought — it's foundational to how we work. Enterprise-grade practices to protect your data.

soc2.title: SOC 2 Type II
soc2.description: Annual audits for security, availability, and confidentiality

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit

gdpr.title: GDPR Ready
gdpr.description: Full compliance with EU data protection

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: RBAC with audit logging and regular reviews

cta.title: Let's build something great
cta.description: Whether you need to ship faster, scale your AI, or secure your systems — we're ready to help. Book a call and let's talk.

footer.tagline: Engineering teams you can rely on. AI, software, design, and security — from Mumbai and San Francisco.

ai-engineering.label: AI Engineering
ai-engineering.tagline: We make AI work in production
ai-engineering.description: Most AI projects die between demo and deployment. We build the infrastructure, pipelines, and integrations that make AI systems reliable at scale.

software.label: Software Engineering
software.tagline: Software built for the next decade
software.description: We engineer systems designed for change. Clean architecture, pragmatic testing, and infrastructure that accelerates your team instead of slowing it down.

design.label: Design
design.description: We don't design for awards. We design interfaces that reduce friction, increase adoption, and move the metrics your business cares about.

ai-security.label: AI Security
ai-security.tagline: Secure your AI before others exploit it
ai-security.description: AI systems have attack surfaces your security team hasn't seen. We find the vulnerabilities—prompt injection, data extraction, adversarial attacks—before bad actors do.

problem.label: The Challenge
problem.title: Scaling is
problem.ai-engineering: You've invested millions in AI initiatives. The prototypes are impressive. But production-grade AI? That's where most organizations stall. Models drift. Pipelines break. And the gap between a compelling demo and enterprise-ready systems grows wider every quarter.
problem.software: Your platform was built for a different era. Now every release feels like defusing a bomb. Technical debt compounds faster than your team can pay it down. And the architecture that got you here won't get you where you need to go.
problem.design: Your product works, but users struggle. Adoption stalls. Support tickets pile up. You're shipping features, but the experience doesn't match the sophistication your enterprise customers expect.
problem.ai-security: You've deployed AI across the organization. But have you stress-tested it? Most enterprise security frameworks weren't built for the unique attack surfaces AI introduces. And the risks aren't theoretical—they're actively being exploited.

solution.label: A Better Way
solution.title: There's a
ai-engineering: What if your AI systems could deploy to production in weeks, with the reliability your SLAs demand?
What if you had full observability into model performance, drift, and cost—before issues hit production?
What if you had engineering partners who've shipped AI at enterprise scale—and know where the bodies are buried?
software: What if your team could ship multiple times a day with complete confidence—even on Friday evenings?
What if you had full visibility into system health, performance bottlenecks, and infrastructure costs?
What if you had architects who've modernized legacy systems for the Fortune 500—and know what actually works?
design: What if your product was so intuitive that adoption happened organically, without training?
What if you could measure exactly how design decisions impact revenue, retention, and efficiency?
What if you had designers who understand enterprise complexity—and know how to make it invisible?
ai-security: What if you could deploy AI confidently, knowing you've tested for the attacks that matter?
What if you had complete visibility into what data your models access, store, and could potentially leak?
What if you had security experts who specialize in AI threats—before they become compliance nightmares?

value.label: Our Expertise
value.title: We've
ai-engineering: We build the infrastructure that turns AI experiments into enterprise assets—production-ready, observable, and built to scale.
We implement MLOps pipelines that give you control over the entire model lifecycle, from training to retirement.
We bring hard-won experience from deploying AI at companies that can't afford downtime.
software: We architect systems designed for the next decade—maintainable, scalable, and ready for requirements you haven't imagined yet.
We modernize legacy platforms incrementally, so you ship value continuously instead of betting everything on a risky rewrite.
We embed with your team to transfer knowledge, not just code. You'll own the capability long after we're gone.
design: We design experiences that reduce friction, accelerate adoption, and move the metrics your business cares about.
We bring research rigor to enterprise UX—understanding your users' workflows before we touch a pixel.
We bridge design and engineering, ensuring what ships is what was designed—pixel-perfect and performant.
ai-security: We identify vulnerabilities in your AI systems before adversaries do—prompt injection, data extraction, model manipulation.
We implement security controls purpose-built for AI, not retrofitted from traditional frameworks.
We prepare you for the compliance landscape that's coming—so you're ahead of regulations, not scrambling to catch up.
